summary: TypeScript SDK documentation lacks coverage for the updates feature, which is already documented in other SDKs (Go, Java, PHP, Python, .NET). The request is to add TypeScript-specific documentation with code examples.
userImpact: TypeScript developers cannot easily learn how to use updates, reducing discoverability and adoption of the feature.
proposedFix: Add TypeScript documentation section covering updates with code snippets, matching the coverage in other SDK docs.
workaround: Developers can reference Go, Java, PHP, Python, or .NET SDK documentation to understand updates usage.
keyQuote: TypeScript SDK documentation doesn't contain any documentation on how to use updates. The Go, Java, PHP, Python and .NET docs seem to cover this
